article_title: Tiffany's operating and finance chief James N. Fernandez to retire in July
article_text:
Tiffany & Co. said veteran executive James N. Fernandez will retire in July, ending a 30-year career with the high-end jewelry retailer.

Ralph Nicoletti, who is 56 years old, will replace Mr. Fernandez as Tiffany's finance chief April 2. Mr. Nicoletti will oversee the company's financial functions and its information technology, Tiffany...
